attributes.action: Remove the injured rabbit from the care of Katey Barber and/or her family.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A BUNNY rabbit was left charred and blistered after its owner's sick sister got drunk and torched it.
Cruel Katey Barber downed seven cans of lager before setting Bunny the rabbit's hutch on fire.
Katey Barber started laughing and said: 'Look, the rabbit's running around on fire'."
The rabbit is now terrified of humans, has permanent scarring and may have to have an ear amputated.

Barber, form nearby Wythenshawe, eventually poured water on the fire last September.

She pleaded guilty to causing unnecessary suffering to a protected animal and will be sentenced on March 23.
Bunny was returned to the care of this family, i believe that Bunny should be removed and re-homed within a caring family who can help to rehabilitate him correctly.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
